w4160.game

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • w4160.game.Renderer

  • public class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Renderer is what transforms the objects and parameters in the scene and transforms it to an image on the screen. It takes into account the shader files and material and lighting properties to create a ShaderProgram, used to render GameItems and light sources using OpenGL.

      • init

        public void init(Window window)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialize the Renderer by setting up the shaders. You don't have to understand this method for now, just use it. You'll learn the shader programming later in this class, and we will dedicate programming assignment 2 for shader programming.
        Parameters:
        window - the current window
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
